Reviews.Title: “Exceeded Expectations of a Hotel Snob”
Reviews.Author: sarahbaker2702
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel weeks ago left late choice hotels am massive snob comes hotel extremely worried read reviews 22 girls travelling city visit museums night bars clubs location hotel perfect leidesplein near enjoyed rembrandt square bit nice bars shops cafes wander dam square person consisted single beds bunk bed bunk bed didnt ladder comical wasnt sat beds ready wasnt wardrobe rail couple drawers days kept bathroom clean smelled bit damp times due lack window cleaned beds comfy clean checked closely soon arriving carpet curtains bit grubby wasnt near bad price hotel bit tidy clean staff friendly bit sarcastic willing help didnt breakfast days looked ok basic stay

Reviews.Title: “Tired hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: SpachNZ
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel solo traveller location close tram stop keizersgracht trams 125 central station walking distance nice restaurants central shower breakfast adequate cheese cold meet bread boiled eggs jams museli fruit salad price reasonable amsterdam staff front desk bell ring stayed lower level wasnt store step hotel clean looking tired refurbishment free wifi available
